channel.title: nonWild, funWild and teleporting
channel.description:
Hello I got a few questions;
Can someone tell me how to make nonWild, explain good please! How to make funWild, or a place where you can die without loosing stuff. How to stop people from teleporting if they don't got good high enoght magic level.
red = Not found out green = Found out [size=14pt]I'm happy for all help I can get![/size]
-pkn00b

item.title: nonWild, funWild and teleporting
item.dc:creator: @singasong singasong
item.description:
@singasong wrote:

jc22493:

Singasong, don’t grave-dig.

soz i was trying to say sumthing at the bottum but it didnt turn out: /
i said that i tryed that and i cant find (notinwilderness)
or anything like that anyother possible things?

Read full topic

item.title: nonWild, funWild and teleporting
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Good gravedig

Reported.

Read full topic

item.title: nonWild, funWild and teleporting
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

[quote=“singasong, post:3, topic:264528”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=349314.msg2685396#msg2685396 date=1235640183]
The Fun wild one:
Create a boolean checking coordinates, such as the nonWild command, and edit the youdied() method
sorry dont hav much time for a full TUT[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 03:27:27 am[/size][hr]the safe zone one:

i tryed doing it and it cant find the thing you told me to search the nonwildthing is there anything else i can search?

Step 1:
Search for this in you client.JAVA file

public boolean nonWild()

you should see under it this line or a line simalar

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 )heightLevel == 1)
lets say you want to make the fountain next to the east ban a safe zone you start here at the south-west of the area you want as a safe zone:

see the co-ord says 3236, 3432. you use the first coord(the x axis) as the first co-ord in the client.java.

e.g:

if((absX >= 3236 && absX <= xaxis && absY >= yaxis && absY <= yaxis )and the second co-ord(the Yaxis) as the first y axis

if((absX >= 3236 && absX <= xaxis && absY >= 3423 && absY <= yaxis) and for the other axis walk to the north east corner

see the axis 3241, 3437

the x axis there is the 2nd in the client and the y is the second in cline so all together it should look like

if((absX >= 3236 && absX <= 3241 && absY >= 3423 && absY <= 3437)

and would u look at that, the fountain is now safe.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 03:31:10 am[/size][hr]The Teleport One:
Copy Something like a modzone or something
but instead of player rights try skills rights
or some sort. but surely as everyone knows
im not to good at codeing…
so i hope everything ive posted helps you and
have a good time CYA!!
[/quote][/quote]
Very nice grave dig. When will people stop?

Read full topic
